metadata.title: Bellino Sling Backpack - Camo (Camo)
features: Features include a padded pocket in the front for a tablet and a zip pocket on the side
Also includes a phone pocket on the shoulder strap, for quick phone access
A mesh pocket for water bottles and a padded strap for a comfortable commute
description: Features include a padded pocket in the front for a tablet, and a zip pocket on the side for small items like keys also includes a phone pocket on the shoulder strap, for quick phone access, a mesh pocket for water bottles, and a padded strap for a comfortable commute.
